posts.postText: pretty sure everyone has heard at least a couple complaints about the guns causing lag, the first guns that the server had (at least when i started on it) were perfect. what happened to those?

+SUPPORT

The guns give off too much lag, as well of being harder to aim due to the smoke coming off the bullet, so you can't see.
I like the old guns, smooth and easier to use.
And for the weapon scanner... how come sometimes you don't spawn with it?
the weapon scanner is like a radio or knife but for guards, its random but i think there is less probability of getting it than a radio or knife

I think there was a CSS fix for the muzzle flash...
Can't find it at the moment :\
